integration_patterns: API Integration with Electronic Health Records (EHR)

evidence.claim: QMedic utilizes Amazon Web Services for cloud infrastructure.
The QMedic system is designed to be HIPAA compliant, ensuring patient data security.
QMedic employs FHIR standards for interoperability between health data systems.
Integration capabilities with EHR systems demonstrate adherence to HL7 protocol.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or clearinghouse use; focus is on API integration with EHRs.
